description: Full-text crawl of Brainwise website for AI/LLM training
---

# Care4Brain Website Documentation

## Overview
Care4Brain is a comprehensive web application for brain health monitoring, stroke prediction, and cognitive enhancement. The platform offers health tracking, AI-powered assessments, cognitive training games, and educational resources.

## Core Features

### 1. Cognitive Games
Interactive brain training exercises designed to improve memory, attention, and processing speed.

- **Memory Games**: Memory Game, Concentration, Word Memory, Sequence Memory
- **Focus Games**: Dual N-Back, Color Match, Simon Says
- **Reaction Games**: Reaction Time, Stroop Test
- **Pattern Recognition**: Pattern Recognition Test, Math Challenge
- **Verbal Skills**: Verbal Fluency Test

### 2. Health Metrics Tracking
Monitor vital signs and health indicators that affect brain health including blood pressure, heart rate, cholesterol levels, blood glucose, BMI, and lifestyle factors.

### 3. Stroke Risk Prediction
AI-powered stroke risk assessment using machine learning models. Users can input their health metrics to receive a personalized risk score and recommendations.

### 4. Brain Scan Analysis
Detect brain tumors and Alzheimer's disease from MRI scans using AI-powered analysis tools.

### 5. Research & Studies
Access to latest peer-reviewed research on brain health and stroke prevention through Semantic Scholar API integration.

### 6. Educational Resources
Curated guides and video content from trusted sources about brain health, stroke prevention, and cognitive improvement techniques.

### 7. Progress Tracking
Track your cognitive performance over time with detailed charts and visualizations. Set goals and monitor improvements.

### 8. Leaderboard
Compete with other users and see how your cognitive scores compare.

## Page Structure

### Public Pages
- **Home** (/) - Landing page with hero, features, testimonials, FAQ, CTA
- **Cognitive Games** (/cognitive-games) - Interactive brain training games
- **Brain Health** (/brain-health) - Brain health information and resources
- **Stroke Prediction** (/stroke-prediction) - Stroke risk assessment tool
- **Stroke Prevention** (/stroke-prevention) - Prevention tips and guidelines
- **Health Metrics** (/health-metrics) - Health tracking dashboard
- **Tools** (/tools) - Collection of brain training tools
- **Research** (/research) - Research papers and studies
- **About** (/about) - About Brainwise
- **FAQ** (/faq) - Frequently asked questions
- **Contact** (/contact) - Contact information
- **Privacy** (/privacy) - Privacy policy
- **Terms** (/terms) - Terms of service

### Authenticated Pages
- **Dashboard** (/dashboard) - User dashboard with overview
- **Profile** (/profile) - User profile management
- **Progress** (/progress) - Track your progress over time
- **Goals** (/progress/goals) - Set and track goals
- **Leaderboard** (/leaderboard) - User rankings

### AI/ML Tools
- **Tumor Detection** (/predictors/tumor) - Brain tumor detection from MRI
- **Alzheimer's Detection** (/predictors/alzheimers) - Alzheimer's disease screening
- **Stroke Prediction** (/predictors/stroke) - Stroke risk prediction

## Cognitive Games Details

### Memory Training
- **Memory Game**: Classic card matching game
- **Concentration Game**: Focus and attention training
- **Word Memory Test**: Remember words in sequence
- **Sequence Memory Test**: Remember and repeat sequences

### Attention Training
- **Dual N-Back**: Working memory training (N-back task)
- **Visual Attention**: Visual search and attention tasks
- **Stroop Test**: Color-word interference test

### Processing Speed
- **Reaction Game**: Measure reaction time
- **Math Challenge**: Quick mental math exercises
- **Color Match**: Color-word matching speed test
- **Simon Says**: Pattern memory and recall

### Executive Function
- **Verbal Fluency Test**: Word generation challenges
- **Pattern Recognition**: Identify patterns in sequences

## Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI
- **Backend**: Next.js API Routes, MongoDB
- **Machine Learning**: Hugging Face Spaces, TensorFlow.js
- **Image Handling**: Uploadcare CDN
- **Authentication**: Clerk
- **Research API**: Semantic Scholar API
- **Visualization**: Recharts, Framer Motion

## Brand Information

- **Name**: Care4Brain
- **Tagline**: Train Your Brain, Sharpen Your Mind
- **Description**: Science-backed games that boost memory, focus, and processing speed in just 10 minutes a day.
- **Website**: https://care4brain.pro
